sourcesContent:
Revision History

version 1.5
  • Added timer for assessments (I113)
  • Updated the About page with current data .Net Core version
  • Moved Done/Finished buttons to the right of the page.
  • Added not about timer to evaluation-student-list.
  • Change menu Checkin to Checkin/out
version 1.4.11
  • Preset from/to dates on attendance report to start/end of cohort (I119)
version 1.4.10
  • Assign assessments to individiual students (I86)
  • Expanded size of date range controls
  • Default date range to entire current year
version 1.4.9
  • Purge logs, uses DSI.GetIp, & fixes inactive cohort
version 1.4.8
  • External IP check using getIp
version 1.4.7
  • Hotfix: External IP service failing to return
version 1.4.6
  • Filter attendance by date range (#103)
version 1.4.5
  • Answer to assessment question not updated in the database. (#108)
version 1.4.4
  • Show active cohorts when assigning assessments (#90)
version 1.4.3
  • Added Refresh link to Evaluation List
version 1.4.2
  • Fixed Cohort list when instructor not selected for a cohort
  • Fixed Cohort edit and detail when instructor not selected
version 1.4.1
  • Added percent score to student evaluation list
version 1.4
  • Inactive students don't display check-in/out button
  • Inactive students evals don't display in the list of all evals
  • Changed actions on eval list to not display take/review on template evals and show review on completed evals
  • Added link to return to eval(a) from eval review if root/admin/instructor
version 1.3.1
  • Fixed duplicate check-ins without a check-out
version 1.3
  • Instructors can create and maintain their own evaluations
  • Instructors can modify assessment scores for students assigned any evaluation regardless of evaluation owner
  • Instructors can only create or modify questions in evaluations they own
  • Check that Role exists for User in System.Service
  • Set IsTemplate default to True on create
version 1.2.1
  • Bump websocket-extensions from 0.1.3 to 0.1.4
  • Bump npm-registry-fetch from 4.0.2 to 4.0.5
  • Bump lodash from 4.17.15 to 4.17.19
  • Bump elliptic from 6.5.2 to 6.5.3
version 1.2
  • Fixed #56 Display only active cohorts
  • Fixed #57 Show success message when assigning an evaluation/assessment to a cohort
  • Fixed #64 display only active users by default
  • Fixed #67 Fix calculated grade on assessments allowing bonus questions
  • Upgrade to .Net Core 3.1 (LTS)
  • Set AspNetCoreHostingModel to OutOfProcess
version 1.1.1
  • Fixed #53 cyclical reducancy error on assessment
version 1.1
  • Added Commentary
  • Added refresh link for assessment list
  • Default sort of assessment list to id descending
  • Added a verify button when students complete an evaluation/assessment
  • Added DONE to Evaluation edit
  • Fixed search of evaluation list by student name
version 1.0
  • 1st production release!
  • Created db log support
  • Limit kb maintenance to root, admin, instructor. Display to all
  • Changed logo to red & while on navy blue
  • Adjusted menu for students and instructors
  • Updated README.md for new team developers
version 0.9
  • Added Kb and KbCategory to replace Feedback for help. (#4)
  • Feedback has been deprecated
  • Added hosting company in footer
  • Changed to use "rights" key for footer
  • Created development team page from about page
version 0.8.1
  • Expanded answers to questions to 255 characters.
  • Rmoved warning message on pre-filled login
version 0.8
  • Added evaluations and assessments (#7,#9):
  • - Added missing footer to questions list and form
  • - Changed external IP console display from WARN to DEBUG
  • - Created 'Evaluation take' so students can complete evaluations
  • - Completed evaluation generates an assessment item
  • - Can assign a template evaluation to all in a cohort
  • - Formatted evaluation review display whether topic eval or assessment
  • Expand UI config key length to 50 and data length to 80 (#31)
version 0.7.2a
  • Fixed incorrect color on checked-in student.
version 0.7.2
  • Default feedback text and response to empty string.
  • Reduce the textarea of text and response to 3 lines.
  • Change the feedback form from "Name" to "Category".
  • Remove text and response from displaying on the list.
  • Change category to select list loaded from config category.n
version 0.7.1
  • Display external IP on login page whether restricted or not.
version 0.7
  • Provides cohort access to instructors
  • Includes all IP addresses of remote students for .Net & Java BCs
  • Added links to return to cohort list from attendance report and student checkinout
  • Added config option to disable IP checking
version 0.6.2
  • Limit instructor to cohorts they teach
version 0.6.1
  • Sorted attendance report by student lastname
  • Sorted attendance records in report by check-in time
  • Changed all database accesss in report generation to async
version 0.6
  • Created the attendance report for a cohort
version 0.5.1
  • Fixed datetime retrieval for Eastern Time format
version 0.5
  • Display failed login message
  • Capture attendance datetime in Eastern Time
version 0.4
  • Added Feedback that allows users to record comments and suggested enhancements
  • Limit users to editing only feedback they authored
  • Can lock a feedback to restict further editing.
  • Root & Admin uses can check in/out users and mark absent and/or excused without pin
  • Fixed issue allowing a student to access check in/out outside of MAX
version 0.1
  • Added Cohort definition for a boot camp
  • Added IsRoot, IsAdmin, IsStaff, IsInstructor, IsStudent roles
